articles.description: LONDON (AP) — Prince William  launched a five-year project to end homelessness in the United Kingdom on Monday, saying he wants to make sure that instances of people being left without a roof over their heads are “rare, brief and unrepeated.”

articles.author: Peter Sblendorio
articles.title: Paul Simon hasn't 'given up hope' of performing after hearing loss - New York Daily News
articles.description: Paul Simon is keeping a positive tune as he deals with hearing loss. The Newark-born, Queens-raised singer-songwriter says he began losing hearing in his left ear about 2½ years ago.
